DEMO_212_MSG_010: ̂Hurry, get outside! There's no time! Our pursuers are...
DEMO_212_MSG_030: ̂It can't be! The Transport Device is just out of our reach!
DEMO_212_MSG_040: ́They've closed in on both sides! There's nowhere to for us to go!
DEMO_212_MSG_050: ̂Is this... ! Is this really how it ends... ?
DEMO_212_MSG_060:
́No, we still have our trump card!
ā
DEMO_212_MSG_080: ́Now's your chance to escape! Everyone, run!
DEMO_212_MSG_090: ́What're you doing? Hurry along with the rest of them.
